title: Possible to get transfer from OCE to KR
body:
Going to the motherland for 3 months and ceebs levelling up from lvl 1 again.

Does anyone know if Riot offer transfer from OCE to KR?

replies.body:
It's not an option in Account: Transfers - but I think if you message Riot they may be able to help, although you need a Korean Social Security Number or if you are visiting I believe you can get an ARC (Alien Registration Card) http://english.visitkorea.or.kr/enu/GK/GK_EN_2_8_1_1.jsp

But again I'm not sure if they will do transfers but it's worth messaging Help and Support. (Pro players have done transfers when they've visited so I know it's possible but I'm not sure if they do it outside pro play).
Ah didn't realise yoyu couldn't transfer.. Why the hell can't we transfer to Kr? Maybe try Garena?
aren't the Korean and Chinese servers on a totally different length to the others?

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HOuxNsLE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-12T11:28:19.726+0000)
>
> aren't the Korean and Chinese servers on a totally different length to the others?

yeah you need a social security number or something to play on the korean server.
